list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Begin logic to init all databases
- accu+0h, accu+1h - Todo finish this logic. Create file that decides how many hours out to go

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
Begin logic to init all databases
- accu+0h, accu+1h - Todo finish this logic. Create file that decides how many hours out to go

task.summary: Update .gitignore
Fix typo

Move Model to single class
- Change from individual files for each model to single class with variable inputs - These files have yet to be deleted

Add Models.txt
- Models.txt is a list of all tried models, both working and otherwise - Added several new APIs
Add info on api intervals

Add several RapidAPI APIs
- Add enum to Model to handle various API types - Add getRapid() function for RapidAPI
Add configuration files to git
Add unfinished logic to refactor json
Add jsonPathToObject() function

Add logic to find root of each model
- Add list of models to Vars.json, each with a "Root" value

Add logic to write any metric to file from json data
- Enter metrics in "Keys" Object in Vars.json - Will be outputted to output/Refactor/Accu.json for example

Add loadJSON() function
- Will load a JSON Object or Array without having to know what type it is

Add saveXML() function
- If Root is set to "XML" in config.json, then saveXML is called by saveData(). - As of right now, it is only called for MetEir.xml
Add conversion logic in saveData() between kts, kph etc.

Begin logic to request all models
- Refactor Model constructor to make use of this logic - Add "Queries" to config.json. This is a list of all urls that should be queried - Move REQUESTTYPE (was APITYPE) to config.json - TODO Make separate configs for different time frames i.e. 1h, 1d

Main() now requests all models in config.json then refactors the results
- Removed "Queries" from config.json, moved url to "Models" - Add unique entry in "Models" for each timestep e.g. Accu_1h, Accu_1d - Add urls to API docs in Models.txt - Add logic to prevent errors through incorrect requestType values

Main() now requests all models in config.json then refactors the results
- Removed "Queries" from config.json, moved url to "Models" - Add unique entry in "Models" for each timestep e.g. Accu_1h, Accu_1d - Add urls to API docs in Models.txt - Add logic to prevent errors through incorrect requestType values

Update data/README.md
- Add additional comments throughout code

Add unit conversion to MetEir Model
- Add WindGust conversion factor to all models (Except you Aeris <3)

Add logic to get EpochDateTime from MetEir.xml
- Add Pressure to keys to be queried

Add metrics precipitation and POP (chance of rain)
- Add table to config/ReadMe containing standardised units for project - Refactor MetEir parsing to take account of separate block for precipitation

Separate MetEir's output into separate files
- Add logic to read time range of MetEir models - Move loadXML out of Model

Add SQL JDBC example SQL.java
- Include mysql-connector-java-8.0.30.jar in lib

Add logic to transfer data from "Reformat" to SQL database
- Todo deal with random ordering of JSON

Bypass saving responses into GET folder, pipe directly into saveData
- Uses JSONObject.parse() to retrieve an Object from a String

Fix ordering of data entered into database
- Before entering data, use ArrayLists and TreeMaps to sort keys - That way, it will always match the table's headers

Add saving all models to sql
- Bypass saving to Refactor/, pipe straight to upload() - Upload examples of http request responses - Add optional logging in uploadAndSave() - Add progress logging to console

Added keysArray to readXML, which breaks everything.
Todo: Reset readXML to as it was before 11/11/2022

Begin logic to init all databases
- accu+0h, accu+1h - Todo finish this logic. Create file that decides how many hours out to go

MESSAGE.value:
Add several RapidAPI APIs
- Add enum to Model to handle various API types - Add getRapid() function for RapidAPI
Add configuration files to git
Add unfinished logic to refactor json
Add jsonPathToObject() function

Add logic to find root of each model
- Add list of models to Vars.json, each with a "Root" value

Add logic to write any metric to file from json data
- Enter metrics in "Keys" Object in Vars.json - Will be outputted to output/Refactor/Accu.json for example

Add loadJSON() function
- Will load a JSON Object or Array without having to know what type it is

Add saveXML() function
- If Root is set to "XML" in config.json, then saveXML is called by saveData(). - As of right now, it is only called for MetEir.xml
Add conversion logic in saveData() between kts, kph etc.

Begin logic to request all models
- Add "Queries" to config.json. This is a list of all urls that should be queried. - Move REQUESTTYPE to - TODO Make separate configs for different time frames i.e. 1h, 1d

Begin logic to request all models
- Add "Queries" to config.json. This is a list of all urls that should be queried - Move REQUESTTYPE (was APITYPE) to config.json - TODO Make separate configs for different time frames i.e. 1h, 1d

Begin logic to request all models
- Refactor Model constructor to make use of this logic - Add "Queries" to config.json. This is a list of all urls that should be queried - Move REQUESTTYPE (was APITYPE) to config.json - TODO Make separate configs for different time frames i.e. 1h, 1d

Main() now requests all models in config.json then refactors the results
- Removed "Queries" from config.json, moved url to "Models" - Add unique entry in "Models" for each timestep e.g. Accu_1h, Accu_1d - Add urls to API docs in Models.txt - Add logic to prevent errors through incorrect requestType values

Update data/README.md
- Add additional comments throughout code

Add unit conversion to MetEir Model
- Add WindGust conversion factor to all models (Except you Aeris <3)

Add logic to get EpochDateTime from MetEir.xml
- Add Pressure to keys to be queried

Add metrics precipitation and POP (chance of rain)
- Add table to config/ReadMe containing standardised units for project - Refactor MetEir parsing to take account of separate block for precipitation

Separate MetEir's output into separate files
- Add logic to read time range of MetEir models - Move loadXML out of Model

Add SQL JDBC example SQL.java
- Include mysql-connector-java-8.0.30.jar in lib

Add logic to transfer data from "Reformat" to SQL database
- Todo deal with random ordering of JSON

Bypass saving responses into GET folder, pipe directly into saveData
- Uses JSONObject.parse() to retrieve an Object from a String

Fix ordering of data entered into database
- Before entering data, use ArrayLists and TreeMaps to sort keys - That way, it will always match the table's headers

Add saving all models to sql
- Bypass saving to Refactor/, pipe straight to upload() - Upload examples of http request responses - Add optional logging in uploadAndSave() - Add progress logging to console

Added keysArray to readXML, which breaks everything.
Todo: Reset readXML to as it was before 11/11/2022
